title: Acne Treatment
description: A specialized treatment designed to clear acne, reduce inflammation, and prevent future breakouts.

title: Brightening Facial
description: A brightening facial that evens out skin tone and reduces the appearance of dark spots for a radiant complexion.

title: Exfoliating Peel
description: This treatment uses a gentle peel to exfoliate dead skin cells, revealing smoother and more youthful-looking skin.

title: Collagen Boost
description: A collagen-boosting treatment that helps to firm and plump the skin, reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
